mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD_REPLY(BOARD_REPLY_NUMBER, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{boardReplyContent}, #{boardNumber}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_REPLY_NUMBER, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, BOARD_REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_NUMBER, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_BOARD_REPLY R ON U.USER_NUMBER = R.USER_NUMBER WHERE BOARD_NUMBER = #{boardNumber} ORDER BY BOARD_REPLY_NUMBER DESC
